sentences.en: Both doctor and Don smiled at this witticism.
sentences.cn: 大夫本人和老头子都对这样的打趣发笑了.

sentences.en: Dating a book nerd is serious business, and only a fellow bibliophile can keep pace with the obscure Jane Austen references or the conversation sprinkled with the witticism of Oscar Wilde.
sentences.cn: 和一个书呆子约会是严肃的事情，只有一个藏书家才能听懂晦涩的简奥斯丁引语或与奥斯卡·王尔德的俏皮话并驾齐驱。

sentences.en: He tries to lighten his lectures with an occasional witticism.
sentences.cn: 他有时想用俏皮话使课堂活跃.

sentences.en: His witticism was as sharp as a marble.
sentences.cn: 他的打趣话十分枯燥无味.

sentences.en: Once in a while, after witticism, he would look down, and his eyes would meet hers.
sentences.cn: 每隔一小会儿, 说了什么俏皮话以后, 他就低下头, 和她目光相交.
